translations.translation: and others of them, yoked together in chains.
And many others bound in bond.
and others that were bound with chains.
The rest of the devils were bound in chains.
And other demons bound in chains.
And also others bound in fetters.
And others fettered in chains.
and others also, coupled in fetters:
And others linked together in chains,
and others chained in fetters.
And others bound in fetters.
and others [too] bound together in chains.
As also others bound together in fetters.
And also others bound in fetters.
and others joined together by (iron) fetters.
And others fettered in chains.
And others bound together in shackles.
[38:38] and others too, from among them, bounded together in fetters, in shackles with their hands tied to their necks.
(And others) and other than these (linked together in chains) in iron chains; these are the rebellious devils who were never entrusted with any work except that they rebelled,

commentaries.author: زيد بن علي
commentaries.text: وقوله تعالى: { وَآخَرِينَ مُقَرَّنِينَ فِي ٱلأَصْفَادِ } معناه في الأَغلالِ، واحدُها صَفدٌ

translations.translation: And His saying, {And others tied together in the chains} [means that] among the shackles, one is Safad.

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: { وَآخَرِينَ } من الشياطين، وهم المردة الممتنعون عن الإطاعة والانقياد، جعلناههم { مُقَرَّنِينَ } مشدودين محبوسين { فِي ٱلأَصْفَادِ } [ص: 38] أي: القيود والأغلال المضيقة بمقتضى أمره وحكمه
